Package managerpro.Model

Class ModelHelper

java.lang.Object
java.util.TimerTask
managerpro.Model.ModelHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ModelHelper
extends java.util.TimerTask
Helper class for the model. Extends TimerTask to allow for scheduling and running the class in a different thread. Running the SELECT operations in a different thread from the UI prevents locking up the UI every time the database needs to be queried
Author:
OTP7

  • Constructor Details

    • ModelHelper

      public ModelHelper​(org.hibernate.SessionFactory sessionFactory)

      ModelHelper constructor. Creates the DAOs. Takes hibernate session factory as a parameter.

      Parameters:
      sessionFactory - Hibernate session factory

    • ModelHelper

      public ModelHelper​(org.hibernate.SessionFactory sessionFactory, java.lang.String s)

      ModelHelper constructor. Creates the DAOs. Takes hibernate session factory and a string as parameters. String should have a value of: tables, reservations, orders, portions, OrderedPortions, to get the corresponding rows from the database.

      Parameters:
      sessionFactory - Hibernate session factory
      s - A string that is used to control the data set that is fetched from DB.

  • Method Details

    • addPropertyChangeListener

    • removePropertyChangeListener

      public void removePropertyChangeListener​(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener propertyChangeListener)

      Removes a PropertyChangeListener

      Parameters:
      propertyChangeListener - PropertyChangeListener to remove

    • run

      public void run()

      The run method is run by Timer and when a new thread is spawned. It tries to put to the queue, and when that is done, lists of Entities are created from the Database data. After all the lists are fetched, a PropertyChangeListener is fired to take the data to Model.

      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      Specified by:
      run in class java.util.TimerTask
